::KitKat::

"US? Attack unarmed?  Oh now wait a sec.  They attacked two of my 
bots and hurt them badly.  I can to save my two friends.  Now why 
don't you lower your weapons and let me go with my friends in peace. 
I won't shot if you won't." She put her gun away and walked to Land 
Mine. She spoke in a soft voice. "Hey kid, your going to be ok."

She picked up Land Mine. "Drillbit, you get Time Bomb.  ANd let's get 
them back to base."  She looked at the maximal group.  "ARe you going 
to stand there and let another life slip away? Let us pass. No more 
fighting today.  On My honor. No more fighting today. Now step aside. 
This one needs help in a bad way."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Rizopas is hit and flies to the ground. A shot flies by 
Stronghold's head
> and flies toward KitKat. Rizopas, Stronghold, and Blender did not 
fire it.
> Deemos steps into the battle, his gun smoking. Artist and Diskus 
posed.
> 
> "You wouldn't be firing at these 3 poor, sober, unarmed fellows 
with those
> nasty dangerous guns, now would you?" Deemos asked. Artist gasped 
and
> growled at KitKat.
> 
> "Diskus say they not being very good!" Diskus said.
> 
> "Why must you Preds do this? You're so mean!" Artist said.
> 
> "When there is trouble, call us! Now drop your weapons!" Deemos 
ordered
> KitKat to drop her weapons, the 6 bots all kept their blasters 
aimed at
> KitKat. Etchingar stood up slowly and was shot in the head by 
Artist.
> Etchingar fell to the ground with a scream. Artist frowns, but he 
knew that
> they had to do that for the good of protection...
